meanings.definition: The state of being disconnected or lacking a connection.
meanings.sent1: The disconnectedness of the internet made it impossible to send emails.
meanings.sent2: The phone call was filled with awkward disconnectedness as the signal kept dropping.
meanings.sent3: The disconnectedness of the puzzle pieces made it impossible to complete the picture.
meanings.sent4: The disconnectedness of the train tracks caused delays in the entire schedule.
meanings.sent5: The disconnectedness of the wires led to a power outage in the entire neighborhood.

meanings.sent1: The disconnectedness of his story made it hard to follow.
meanings.sent2: The disconnectedness in her argument made it difficult to understand her point.
meanings.sent3: The disconnectedness of the movie plot left the audience confused.
meanings.sent4: The disconnectedness of the music disrupted the flow of the concert.
meanings.sent5: The disconnectedness of the timeline made the history lesson confusing.

meanings.sent1: She felt a sense of disconnectedness from her classmates after moving to a new school.
meanings.sent2: The disconnectedness he experienced after the loss of his pet was overwhelming.
meanings.sent3: The disconnectedness she felt at the party made her want to leave early.
meanings.sent4: His disconnectedness from reality was evident in his strange behavior.
meanings.sent5: The disconnectedness of the character from the rest of the story made him intriguing.
